SwarmOfBees.NAME: Swarm Of Bees
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: Whenever you play a card, deal #b
damage to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b

Panda.NAME: PAnda
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of your turn, deal #b
damage to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b

RainbowLouse.NAME: Rainbow Louse
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of your turn, deal #b
damage to a random enemy and gain that much #yTemporary #yHP. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b
damage to a random enemy and gain that much #yTemporary #yHP.
